resources.string: What should you know?
Winline is a one player puzzle game.
The player can move one ball per turn to a particular place if there is path to there
A path is a linked set of vertical and horizontal empty cells between 2 position.
The goal is to score points by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least five balls of the same colour.
The balls involves in a score will disappear, adding those balls to the player points.
When you score you gain one turn, e.g. you can move another ball.
If you move and not score three new balls are added (at random colour and position).
The game is over either the board is full or empty.

You won\'t get points for a configuration of five or more balls in a row if you last move isn\'t part of such configuration (e.g. five or more in a row caused by random allocation of the three new balls added).
Move ball (Step 1)
To move a ball touch the ball you want to move.
Move ball (Step 2)
After a ball is selected touch on the empty cell you want to move it.
Combo score

The combo give you the opportunity to increments your points during a period of time (10 sec). Any subsequent score (during this time) will multiply the points by a multiplier starting in 2 (incrementing consecutively by 1 on each score).
No score
If you move a ball without make a score, three new balls will be added to the board at random position.
Game record
Touch the start next to your current score to see your best record.
Save game
You can save your game touching on this button. The game will be on the list of saved games.
New game
You can create a new game touching on this button. If your current game isn\'t saved yet a dialog will be warn you about it.
Select a saved game
Touch on this button to see the list of your saved games. Here you can see when you saved it, the score and the time you spend on it. To select one, just touch on it.
Try the demo!
